Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Pigsflew
Reviews.Content: Pros - Great hardware - ICS, with Jelly Bean on the way - International + LTE, 32Gb, faster, lower power processor (this is the best One X model) - Sense isn't half bad, and Cyanogen 10 nightlies are available now.Cons / Good to Know - The Internationalization is missing En-US because the phone was never meant to be sold here. Get MoreLocale 2 to save yourself some headaches. - The Pogo pin dock from HTC will not work with this phone. Available MicroUSB docks do not throw it into dock mode.It's a fantastic piece of kit and I'm glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: htc one xl the best so far
Reviews.Author: Alyafai , Abdulqawi
Reviews.Content: The mobile been received from amazon at very good condition, so far with me for about one month I enjoy the quality of HTC exterior nice & attractive shape with unique Widgets of HTC sense
